Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball put up 11 points, 3 assists, and 3 rebounds on 44% shooting from the field in 15 minutes of play against the Cleveland Cavaliers.
Pre-Game Insights: Many had questioned how Ball would look in his second game back and if his knee would flare up.
Post-Match Reflections: Ball mentioned that he's been pain-free for the second straight game. Ball doesn't believe his play has surpassed his expectations.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago Bulls still have a major logjam at the guard position and will have a plethora of roster issues to figure out as the season progresses.
Others: The Chicago Bulls will open their season against the New Orleans Pelicans on October 23.
